item.title: Relicensing Stash & KubeDB
item.description: AppsCode is relicening various components of the Stash and KubeDB products. We have decided to use simple, standardized, plain-language software source code licenses from the PolyForm Project. Please see the table below for the upcoming changes: Why now? AppsCode started as a commercial entity to accelerate the adoption of Kubernetes and containers in the Enterprise. We launched a number of open source products like Voyager, Stash, KubeDB, KubeVault, Kubeform, etc. Consequently, we began receiving many feature requests, bug reports and general support questions via our GitHub repositories and public slack account.
